summary: Wasn\'t a big fan of the way the Companion brothers looked, so I cleaned them up and gave them some different features that makes them more striking.
descriptionHtml:
Wasn\'t a big fan of the way the Companion brothers looked, so I cleaned them up and gave them some different features that makes them more striking. 

just drop the \"Sexy Farkas and Vilkas.esp\" on the Data Folder and load it up with your other plugins in the launcher. 

I used:
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - BetterMales_Nudes_NoTextureFaces_v1-9 by Chris57
Covereyes - eyes 1 by mrLenski
No More Blocky Faces - No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_50 by Xenius
Straight hair retexture - straight hair 1_1 by navetsea
author: Darkite
